capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia's lineage is quite interesting. I've been studying the maculogy of that particular plant, and it seems to have a very specific pattern of spots on its petals. I'm fairly certain that this unique characteristic is what sets petunias apart from other flowers in terms of their genetic makeup.
